Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a two-run home run in the second inning
Kerry Carpenter added an RBI single in the third
Mickey Moniak made it 3-2 with a 409-foot homer to right-center in the sixth
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said 'We are obviously in a much better place than we’ve been for quite a while, and we’ve earned it.'
Angels manager Ron Washington said 'We played a better game tonight, but we just didn’t put any runs on the board.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers moved two games over.500 at 68-66 for the first time since May 7
The Angels lost their seventh straight game and have dropped 13 of 15
Others: The teams were forced to wait out a lengthy rain delay at the outset for the second straight night
Former Dodger Kenta Maeda got the victory for the Tigers against the Angels on Wednesday
